judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagbn, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. See Post Conviction Hearing Act of January 25, 1966, P. L. (1965) 1580, §4(a), 19 P.S. §1180-4 (a).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Charles Coleman, appellant, in propria persona.

Steven II. Qoldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth., appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Coleman, Appellant.
Submitted April 19, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagbn, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Charles Coleman, appellant, in propria persona.
Steven II. Qoldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth., appellee.
October 12, 1971:
